name: A Woman of Conviction
description: Sirella knows her husband, Martok... and this petaQ is not her husband! Help Sirella discover what has changed many leading Klingons of the Empire, and restore them to themselves!
rules:
-- In a Skirmish Event, you will engage in space battles against thematically appropriate foes until the Event's conclusion.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- Unique Ship Battle Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Sirella, Remmick, Martok, Klingon Crew, or matching a Battle Trait will provide a bonus.
-- Using the I.K.S. T'ong, U.S.S. Defiant, or K'vort Bird of Prey will provide a bonus to hull.
-- Every Ship Battle you win earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Sirella, Remmick, Martok, or Klingons

action.name: You Know How Much I Hate To Lose

featured_crew.name: Remmick
featured_crew.flavor: Inhabited by a parasite, Remmick infiltrated Starfleet Command to compromise their command structure for nefarious purposes.

featured_crew.name: Martok
featured_crew.flavor: A gifted Klingon fighter, Martok rose to the rank of General and, eventually Chancellor of the Klingon Empire.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.

Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

next_threshold_rewards.name: Credits
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

screens.text: "Human, I require your assistance. My husband, Martok, is not acting like himself. He is attacking without cause or fairness. And he is not the only one."
"Many other leaders of the Empire have joined his foolhardy cause or struck out on their own ventures. Klingon men are often fools, but not to the point of dishonor."
"Martok has attempted to prevent me from investigating further. You will engage his ship and keep him busy so that I may learn what is truly going on here."
"I tell you, woman, there is nothing wrong with me! Leave matters of war to Klingon men--the house is your domain. Argh!"
"I have knocked him unconscious. I swear, if I had not already confirmed that this body, at least, is still my real husband, I would kill him and every other addled Klingon man where they stand."

responses.text: "Yes! The creatures tried to take over the Federation, and now the Empire."
"The log says Remmick tried to activate a homing beacon before he died..."

screens.text: "It is as I suspected. He is being controlled, by some sort of parasitic creature. I believe Starfleet has encountered its kind before, in a former officer named Remmick."
"Perhaps he succeeded. You humans can never finish things properly."
"Hah! I suppose you would turn green at the sight of gagh, then? Humans are so squeamish."

"Your logs say killing the mother parasite ended the infestation. We can only hope that a temporal anomaly has brought Remmick back, and it is he carrying it once again... not a Klingon, or my husband."

"But if it is Martok, he would want us to kill him, for the sake of the Empire. Determining who carries the mother parasite and giving them a honorable death will be my task. Yours will be to continue to engage their ships as a distraction. Go!"
